example.code:
PS C:\>New-EC2KeyPair -KeyName "my-key-pair"
KeyName KeyFingerprint KeyMaterial ------- -------------- ----------- my-key-pair a0:b1:c2:d3:e4:f5:a6:b7:c8:d9:e0:f1:a2:0... -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----...
example.description: This example request creates a key pair named my-key-pair. The KeyFingerprint member of the returned object contains the SHA-1 digest of the DER encoded private key and the KeyMaterial member contains the unencrypted PEM encoded RSA private key.
This example request creates a key pair named my-key-pair and captures the PEM encoded RSA private key in a file named my-key-pair.pem.
